libconflate

0.9.6-10-g2d188f2

Introduction

libconflate is a library that helps you configure large installations of applications easily.

It's designed to be easy to use, safe, and autonomous while still leveraging centralized resources to allow you to have your clusters easily adapt to change.

API Documentation

Jump right into the modules docs to get started.
